pitch.cc: That was pitch number 45 for Dan Haren; his effectiveness may start slipping, as he holds opposing hitters to a .202 average in the first 45 pitches but they hit .266 off him after that.

atbat.des_es: Victor Martinez batea elevado de out a jardinero central Peter Bourjos.

pitch.cc: Dangerous count for Dan Haren; Victor Martinez is a dead-red fastball hitter, with a .945 OPS against them this season and .853 against everything else.
Dan Haren got Victor Martinez to chase a four-seam fastball; Martinez is hitting .077 against them in that location this season compared to .324 overall.
